document.comment: Generated automatically from Godot engine sources.

section.title: æè¿°
section.paragraph: Mesh is a type of Resource that contains vertex array-based geometry, divided in surfaces. Each surface contains a completely separate array and a material used to draw it. Design wise, a mesh with multiple surfaces is preferred to a single surface, because objects created in 3D editing software commonly contain multiple materials. The maximum number of surfaces per mesh is RenderingServer.MAX_MESH_SURFACES.

entry.paragraph: create_convex_shape(clean: bool = true, simplify: bool = false) const
